pages.text: Calling upon the protection of an ancient sun deity, forgotten even in the time of the Druids, this ritual drastically alters the weather & time cycle.$(br2)Rain is dispelled by this ritual, while the length of a day is increased, and the duration of night is shortened.$(br2)In addition, nearby undead, anathema to the sun, will be smote with fire.

$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier I$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_divine_protection#multiblock)a single standing stone is required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.
A single $(l:rituals/standing_stone)standing stone$() of runestone or runed obsidian is required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:divine_protection/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Undead damage area extends $(ritual:divine_protection/radius_x) and $(ritual:divine_protection/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:divine_protection/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Rain$(): Rain is cleared: $(ritual:divine_protection/BOOL/rain).$(br2)$(bold)Time$(): Time is adjusted: $(ritual:divine_protection/BOOL/time). Night is decreased by $(ritual:divine_protection/NIGHT/night_reduction). Day has a $(ritual:divine_protection/PERCENT/day_extension) chance to be extended every tick.$(br2)

$(bold)Damage$(): The ritual deals $(ritual:divine_protection/HEART/fire_damage) hearts of fire damage to undead entities, or $(ritual:divine_protection/HEART/consecration_damage) hearts of fire damage if consecration is installed.$(br2)Additionally, undead creatures who are damaged are also set on fire for $(ritual:divine_protection/fire_duration) seconds.
